text: The 2019–20 season was Damac's 48th year in their history and first season back in the Pro League since the 1981–82 season after gaining promotion for finishing in the second place in the MS League last season. The club participated in the Pro League and the King Cup. The season covered the period from 1 July 2019 to 9 September 2020. ==Players== ===Squad information=== ===Out on loan=== ==Transfers and loans== ===Transfers in=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
